tried signing up for the free £10 without depositing any money...surprise surprise it wouldn't work. said "this player not eligible for bonus" If something looks too good to be true, it usually is. The worst app and site I ever seen, absolutely crash every 5 min or less. Also very annoying thing is that you can't even withdraw the money that you deposited directly, I don't know how many days it took for others but I wait 3 workable days and it still didn't transfered. The bonus that you take at your 1st deposit is just fake money that you can't withdraw it also. It's absolutely waste of time and money. Also read others reviews before downloading similar apps.
